description.full: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor  Play 6 of the most popular sports in the world in a single game and show the world what kind of game you have! Play football, baseball, soccer, tennis, basketball and golf and climb to the top of the real-time leaderboards, or challenge your friends for the ultimate competitive experience. Master each sport and dominate the competition!
